content: everyone s favorite hat a craven ~ ig @mor_oddz_n_endz everyone s favorite hat… the final last …a cozy hat that everyone loves wearing this is four row will my go to hat design when someone asks me to be decreasing make them a hat to create the skills needed knit and purl crown of the yarn i used lion brand wool ease thick & quick hat in slate for picture 1 and charcoal for picture 2 the first or any super bulky size 6 yarn of your choice for decrease will this hat be ssk until needles circular ~ us size 13 16 length i the end of the used circular needles for the entire project i round 22 wanted to keep this pattern simple for beginner stitches remain knitters who may have limited tools knit all stitches for the next two rounds gauge 2 25 stitches per inch the last decrease will be k2tog to the end of the finished dimensions 19 5/20 circumference round 11 stitches remain fits up to a 23 head circumference at the end of the last round cut a length of yarn approximately 13 tall that will allow you to close the top of the hat with a darning needle and yarn thread through each of the stitches on the needles once you are sure you have threaded through each stitch remove the needles and cable pull the yarn so it gathers the top of the hat and closes the hole turn the hat inside if needed and secure the yarn to crown of the hat finishing touches…you can add a pom pom for a feminine touch i used a 3 9 inch/10 cm faux fur pom pom abbreviations k = knit p = purl ssk = slip slip i d love to see your hats please feel free to knit k2tog = knit next 2 stitches together tag me on instagram and for a little *k1 p1* = repeat k1 p1 to end of the round inspiration follow me at now for the fun stuff… cast on 45 stitches i use the long tail cast on for my hats 44 stitches for body of the hat and 1extra stitch to join the round after joining the round row 1 - begin 1 x 1 ribbing *k1 p1* to the end of the row row 2 and subsequent row - continue knitting each row with *k1 p1* until you reach 12 version 1 1 january 5 2026 updates include details for decreasing
